entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 10:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -29.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -32.3°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 17.
